mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio (prtf_cd, ent_cd, prtf_ttl, prtf_cn, prtf_dwnld_cnt, prtf_reg_ymdt, adm_cd, stc_cd) VALUES (#{prtfCd}, #{entCd}, #{prtfTtl}, #{prtfCn}, 0, NOW(), #{admCd}, 'SD_ACTIVE')
INSERT INTO content_list (cl_cd, cntd_cd, cl_reg_ymdt) VALUES (#{clCd}, #{cntdCd}, NOW())
INSERT INTO category_mapping (ctgry_id, cl_cd, cm_reg_ymdt, mbr_cd) VALUES (#{ctgryCd}, #{clCd}, NOW(), #{mbrCd})
INSERT INTO tag (tag_cd, tag_nm, mbr_cd, tag_reg_ymdt) VALUES (#{tagCd}, #{tagName}, #{mbrCd}, NOW())
INSERT INTO tag_mapping (tag_cd, cl_cd, tm_reg_ymdt, mbr_cd, stc_cd) VALUES (#{tagCd}, #{clCd}, NOW(), #{mbrCd}, 'SD_ACTIVE')
mapper.select: SELECT prtf_cd FROM portfolio WHERE prtf_cd LIKE 'PO_C%' ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(prtf_cd, 5) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT tag_cd FROM tag WHERE tag_cd LIKE 'T_C%' ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(tag_cd, 5) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT tag_cd FROM tag WHERE tag_nm = #{tagName}
SELECT cl_cd FROM content_list WHERE cntd_cd = #{prtfCd} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE ent_cd = #{entCd} ORDER BY prtf_reg_ymdt DESC
SELECT c.ctgry_id as ctgryId, c.ctgry_nm as ctgryNm FROM category c JOIN category_mapping cm ON c.ctgry_id = cm.ctgry_id JOIN content_list cl ON cm.cl_cd = cl.cl_cd WHERE cl.cntd_cd = #{prtfCd}
SELECT t.tag_nm FROM tag t JOIN tag_mapping tm ON t.tag_cd = tm.tag_cd JOIN content_list cl ON tm.cl_cd = cl.cl_cd WHERE cl.cntd_cd = #{prtfCd}
mapper.delete: DELETE os FROM outsourcing_status AS os JOIN outsourcing_contract_details AS ocd ON os.ocd_cd = ocd.ocd_cd WHERE ocd.cl_cd = #{clCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE portfolio SET prtf_ttl = #{prtfTtl}, prtf_cn = #{prtfCn}, prtf_mdfcn_ymdt = #{prtfMdfcnYmdt} WHERE prtf_cd = #{prtfCd}
